yourLanguagePreference:
Your language preference 
can be changed at any 
time in setting
chooseFromOptions:
Choose from options 
like Football or TV 
Shows.
decideWhetherYouWant:
Decide whether you want to 
create a story about a Club, 
Player, or Movie.
provideResponsesTo:
Provide responses to 
the five questions 
presented.
askAItoCreateTheStory:
Ask AI to create the 
story based on your 
inputs.
shareTheGeneratedStory:
Share the generated 
story with your 
friends.
